summary.p: The Compute Scalar operator evaluates an expression to produce a computed scalar value. This may then be returned to the user, referenced elsewhere in the query, or both. An example of both is in a filter predicate or join predicate. The Defined Values property indicates what values are to be computed by this operator.
Compute Scalar is a logical and physical operator.

tr.td: Specifies the set of expressions computed by the Compute Scalar operator.
